entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
